description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

The Piraeus app has been redesigned to offer you an improved banking experience through a modern, upgraded, friendly, easy-to-use and modern experience.

From the dashboard page you can explore an overview of your relationship with Piraeus Bank, and you can also easily initiate a new transaction. Also, the dashboard page has been enriched with the "Piraeus in the spotlight" section where you can find propositions that promote your banking relationship, as well as the "Stories" section where you can find short articles of general interest with important new information.

From the "Deposits" section, you can view a summary of your account balances or a detailed view of your transactions for each account. Selecting an account, you can initiate multiple transactions from the Transact button. In addition, you can open a new account.

From the "Cards" section you can manage your debit, credit, and prepaid cards. You can also view the balances and transactions of your cards, make a card payment, block temporarily a card, issue a new card, set new card limits, manage card controls management and much more.

From the "Loans" section you can view important information about your loans.

From the "Insurance" section you can view important information about your insurance products.

From the "Investments" section you view important information about your investment products.

Security management:
- Setup security features for Quick login (4-digit PIN or biometric authentication for compatible devices).
- By activating the app’s notifications, the extraPIN code is automatically received and submitted by your device when authentication is required for your mobile app transactions. You just confirm the transaction using your quick login, saving time with increased security.

For any further information, or assistance in your banking experience, you can contact us through supportebanking@piraeusbank.gr

The service is provided under the current restrictions on capital transfers.

Banking the way you want to live. 
The human European neobank. 



Snappi, the 1st Greek neobank licensed by the European Central Bank, makes banking easier, smoother, and more human. We bring together the trust of traditional banks with the speed and simplicity of fintech, so you can handle everyday money with zero hassle. No paperwork, no branch visits, no fees. Just seamless, trustworthy banking for your everyday life.  

With deposit protection up to €100,000 and top-tier security, you stay in control of your money—saving time for what truly matters. 



Everything you need from a bank, in one app: 



Digital account opening in less than 5 minutes – get your IBAN and virtual debit card instantly, wherever you are. 

Virtual debit Mastercard – add to your digital wallet for fast, secure payments. 

Physical debit Mastercard – shop and withdraw cash from everywhere. 

Send, receive, shop with zero fees. 

No fee for exchange rates- spend like a local on your foreign currency purchases. 

Greek IBAN – payments, transfers, IRIS payments, building tax exemption. 

24/7 human customer support – real people, real answers via phone, email or in-app chat. 

Snappi Pay Later – split purchases into 4 interest-free payments, no credit card needed. 

Security features to stay in control – lock or cancel your card instantly, with one tap. 

 

Who We Are 
Snappi is a joint initiative of Piraeus Financial Holdings (parent company of Piraeus Bank) and Natech, a leading fintech in core banking software. 


Snappi – Simple. Reliable. Human. 
Banking that speaks your language — smart, seamless, and human. 
So you spend less time on money, and more time on what truly matters. 

Download the app now and experience banking the way you want to live. 

Learn more: www.snappibank.com

NBG Mobile Banking: The app that meets all your banking needs! 
With over 2 million users, as the top banking app in Greece, we continue to enhance your experience, making transactions easier and safer.

Αll services at your fingertips: 
Open an NBG account easily via your mobile device and get a debit card and Digital Banking credentials through eGov-KYC. Already a customer? Use your debit card to instantly gain online access to your accounts. 

Smart saving: 
Organize your savings for every goal with the digital piggy bank, Money Box!

Easy product management: 
• Activate your card online and set transaction limits 
 • Unlock your PIN 
 • Freeze or unfreeze your card 
 • Report a lost/stolen card and reissue it 

Acquiring banking products online: 
With NBG Mobile Banking, you can instantly acquire new banking products, such as: 
• Express Loan up to €6,000 
 • Savings or Βenefits accounts 
 • Money Box 
 • Debit cards for individuals and businesses 
 • Credit cards for all your needs 
 • Prepaid and Virtual Prepaid cards 
 • Term deposits (e-3month) 

Instant notifications 
Stay updated with alerts for account and card activity, whenever you receive your salary or make purchases.
 
Fast and secure transactions 
Pay bills, credit cards, top-up or withdraw from prepaid cards, and transfer money within Greece via IRIS payments. You can also easily approve your online purchases with your card. 

Update your personal details 
Easily and quickly update your information without paperwork using eGov-KYC. 

Enjoy the best banking experience at your fingertips with NBG Mobile Banking!

Freedom to save and invest. Join our 400,000 community of European investors on your own investment journey. Create your portfolio and use our award-winning investment ideas.
 
MORE THAN 1 MILLION INSTRUMENTS
Create a balanced and liquid portfolio by investing in more than 1 million stocks, ETFs, bonds, and stock options from 15 global stock exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia.
  
PROFESSIONAL MARKET ANALYSIS 
Stay informed with the investment ideas based on strategic market research conducted by Freedom24 award-winning analysts. The service is available to our clients free of charge. 
 
TRADE WHEREVER YOU ARE 
Use our powerful mobile app to open and close trades, track quotations and price charts in real time, access convenient currency exchange tools and stay informed with our smart market news feed.
 
NATIVE-LANGUAGE SUPPORT
Operating all across the EU, Freedom24 has dedicated local teams based in Germany, France, Austria, Italy, Spain, Poland, Greece, the Netherlands, Bulgaria and Cyprus, who are there to provide personalized support on every step of your way.
 
HIGHEST LEVEL OF INDUSTRY COMPLIANCE
Freedom Finance Europe Ltd., an operating company of Freedom24, is a licensed EU broker. We comply with the European regulatory framework, including MiFID II, and work with trusted counteragents, like Euroclear, to ensure the safety of your investments and funds. Through our NASDAQ-listed holding company, we are also accountable to the SEC.
 
 
 
Investments in financial securities always carry the risk of capital loss. Forecasts and past performance are no guarantee of future results.

The Eurobank Mobile App is updated with smart functionality, offering a user experience driven by your own needs.
 
Discover its possibilities:
 
All your options in one screen: You will find everything you need on dashboard, including all your accounts’ balance, current month’s income and expenses, details for each of your accounts and cards separately, and the €pistrofi amount you have earned through purchases with Eurobank cards.
You can also access your Loan, Investment, and Insurance products just with a swipe left from dashboard.
Protect your privacy from others: New feature to hide or unhide amounts enabled with a single gesture.
Quick access to transactions: You can initiate your transactional activity by selecting any of the three options available on top of dashboard or by selecting the red button anywhere on the Eurobank Mobile App. Easy access to Transfer funds, Bill Payments, IRIS Payments, “Favourite transactions”, Standing Orders.
Card management: Manage your cards directly from your dashboard. You can activate, pay, load, and temporarily deactivate your cards.
Contacts: Ability to access, not only the contacts saved on your phone device, but also all the contacts you keep at your e-Banking account in order to easily complete your transactions.
Products and Services: Easy access to a wide variety of online products for your digital purchases by selecting “Products” at the bottom of your dashboard.

If your business is a legal entity, please download the Eurobank Business App.
If you are not a Eurobank customer yet, you can open an account in 15 minutes without having to physically visit our stores.

myAADEapp is the official mobile app of the Independent Authority for Public Revenue (Greece), which enables citizens and businesses to view their tax account and make payments using their payment card with instant processing time.
In addition, through the application, users can update the IBAN of their bank account for receiving tax refunds and have access to their appointments, the requests they have sent to IAPR and the messages they have received. Finally, in the myWallet section, users can download and save useful documents such as certificates and tax returns while receiving real-time personalized notifications on issues tailored to their needs.

Access e-Banking from your mobile phone!


myAlpha Mobile was created for those of you that are always on the move, offering you the flexibility and autonomy you need to carry out your banking transactions from your mobile phone. Via myAlpha Mobile, you can also start banking with us or if you are already an existing Alpha Bank customer you can enroll to e-Banking.


Do you want to open your first Alpha Bank account without visiting a branch?


Now you can via myAlpha Mobile!
Get an account, a debit card and e-Banking access in a few minutes, without having to visit a Branch.


Do you need access to e-Banking?


If you have an Alpha Bank account and an active Alpha Bank card, you can register to e-Banking online, at no cost. Download the application on your mobile phone, follow the steps, and get a Username and Password to connect to e-Banking from wherever it might suit you each time! Whether that is your computer or tablet via myAlpha Web, your mobile via myAlpha Mobile or even the telephone via myAlpha Phone, banking with Alpha Bank becomes simple!


myAlpha Mobile for convenience and speed in your transactions!!


Login using a 4-digit PIN, fingerprint or FaceID (for devices that support it), find out about your products, pay bills and send money wherever you wish in minutes, now even easier, activating Push Notifications on the mobile app, the most convenient way to approve your transactions!


See what you can do via the app!


Get information on:
- the balance and activity of your products, as well as products that you hold in other Greek banks.
- your tax deduction as well as your withdrawals and daily transfer limits
- your Bonus Points via My Bonus Account


Carry out transactions such as:
- bills, credit cards and loans payments
- transfers within Alpha Bank and remittances to accounts within Greece and abroad
- e-commerce payments via QR Code scanning (IRIS Online Payments)
- commission free direct transfers to and from your mobile contacts up to Euro 500 per day, using your mobile phone number or e-mail of your contact, via IRIS Online Payments

Get online products, such as:
- myAlpha Quick Loan, a consumer loan up to 5.000€ via your mobile phone, for your daily needs
- Alpha Bank debit cards: Enter Bonus Mastercard, Enter Bonus Visa
,Enter Mastercard, Enter Visa

You may also:
- update your contact information online by uploading the necessary documents without having to visit a Branch
- pay your bills even faster with Scan 2 Pay, even using your credit cards
- manage your cards, such as temporarily block or unblock them for online or POS transactions, as well as, usage at ATMs, cancel, replace them or even request a new PIN to be sent via SMS
- add your Alpha Bank cards to myAlpha Wallet, your digital wallet.
- save your transactions on your device or e-mail yourself a copy upon completion
- cancel any pending transactions that you no longer wish to carry out
- get updates from the Bank in your Inbox


Along with:
- searching and tracking an Alpha Bank Branch, ATM or an Automated Payment System (APS) using maps and relevant route directions
- contacting us anytime for your transactions or queries
- getting familiar with the demo account


We are listening!
Our goal is to provide you with the best possible service levels. We listen to your suggestions and comments and are constantly updating the app with new features.
You can contact us at ebankingsupport@alpha.gr

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Welcome to tbi bank – the smart way to shop, pay, and manage your money.
Get a free account in BGN and EUR, make transfers and withdraw from ATMs with no fees.
Activate your neon credit – have extra funds available anytime. Split your purchases into 3, 6, or 12 installments – directly from your phone.
Need additional financing? Apply for a personal loan and manage everything easily in the app: track your obligations, pay installments, request a payment holiday, and control your budget.
Shop smart in the app’s Shopping section:
Discover over 200 favorite online stores across categories like fashion, electronics, and more. Buy now, pay later with neon credit.
The best part? You get money back for your Shopping section purchases – up to 10% as Rewards.
Download the tbi bank app and enjoy banking freedom.

*Please note that the Greek version of the app does not yet offer all the services mentioned above, but they will be available soon.


TBI Bank EAD, with headquarters and address for correspondence: Sofia 1421, Lozenets district, 52-54 Dimitar Hadjikotsev Street, e-mail: office@tbibank.bg, website : www.tbibank.bg, registered in the Commercial Register at the Registry Agency at the Ministry of Justice with UIC 131134023, licensed as a Bank and respectively carrying out banking activity according to License № B 30 and Orders RD 22-1067 / 13.08.2003, № RD 22 - 1067 / 12.06.2007, RD 22 - 1560 / 20.07.2007, RD 22 - 2270 / 16.11.2009, RD 22 - 0451 / 28.02.2012 and RD 22 - 0451 / 22.10 .2012 of the BNB.

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

No bank account or credit card? No problem. 

Download the PaysafeCard app and explore how you can use your cash online, get gift cards or use our app as a wallet with your personal debit Mastercard and IBAN.  
 
Access everything you need in a single tap. 

PaysafeCard
Register for free and pay with cash online. 
- Sign up (16+) and make payments within minutes of downloading the app Buy a prepaid code in 600.000+ sales outlets worldwide  
- Get a PaysafeCard code from the app. Simply select the payment method of your choice and buy one from the comfort of your own home at no additional cost 
- Use your PaysafeCard balance on over 3,500 websites including your favorite igaming and entertainment sites by entering your login details at the checkout  
- Stay safe by not sharing personal and financial details online   
- Manage your balance conveniently in in the app 
- Keep control of your costs through prepaid payments  

Account & Card*
Upgrade to Account & Card, the alternative to your bank account. Activate our feature online or in the app today to receive your debit Mastercard and your personal IBAN. 
- Register an account in minutes (18+)   
- Instant SEPA bank transfers  
- Physical & virtual debit Mastercards  
- Worldwide payments with your card including Apple Pay  
- Cash withdrawals at any ATM  
- Cash deposits via PaysafeCard and Paysafecash  
- Keep track of your transactions 

Gift Card Shop
Buy vouchers for your favourite shops, like the PlayStation Store, XBox, Twitch, Netflix, Zalando and more. Give it to your loved ones or simply use it to protect your payment details online.  

Get your PaysafeCard prepaid codes without leaving your house. Simply buy them online without any extra fees.  

Questions
 
Please contact info@paysafecard.com or visit our website www.paysafecard.com for more information, assistance and our terms and conditions. You can also find us on Facebook, X and Instagram: @paysafecard  

Say goodbye to multiple apps and download PaysafeCard to simplify your finances.  

*Available in selected countries

The first bank wide loyalty program in Greece, now available on your smartphone!
The National Bank of Greece's Go For More mobile application offers quick and easy access to over 6.900 partners wherever you are, while enabling you to view your disposable points at any moment!

•	Discover personalized offers and interesting articles.
•	View analytically the Go For More points which have been gathered and redeemed from your daily transactions, as well as the points which are about to expire.  
•	Get informed of the value of your points in Euro.
•	Find the merchant stores which are situated closest to your location using the interactive map.
•	Invite a friend to register onto the program and collect, as a reward, extra Go For More points.

The procedure of downloading the Go For More application is free of charge, however data charges from your network provider still apply.

developer: COSMOTE PAYMENTS - ELECTRONIC MONEY SERVICES SINGLE MEMBER S.A.
description:
payzy is the new, secure way of making payments through your mobile! Now you can make your everyday purchases safely, pay bills instantly, and send or receive money from friends like never before.

Only with the payzy app, you enjoy:

payzy cashback:
Every time you pay with the payzy Visa debit card, you earn 1% payzy cashback on the value of your purchases in €, allowing you to use them however and whenever you want, both in Greece and abroad, without any restrictions! Take advantage of our frequent cashback offers for even more savings!

Chat & Pay:
Connect with all your friends who have payzy by syncing your contacts with a click. Send or receive money instantly while chatting!

Split It:
Automatically split expenses with your friends, without calculations and hassles! You create the group, and the payzy app takes care of the rest for you!

Virtual payzy Visa Debit Card:
Get a virtual payzy debit card easily, quickly, and completely FREE through your mobile device!

Piggys:
Your new electronic piggy, allowing you to save money easily, quickly, and securely for whatever purpose you desire!

Download the payzy app and experience a new world of mobile payments!

Με την εφαρμογή του Προγράμματος Επιβράβευσης Yellow της Τράπεζας Πειραιώς, έχεις όλα τα προνόμια του Yellow στο κινητό σου και ακόμα περισσότερα!
Κατέβασέ την σήμερα στην συσκευή σου (iphone ή ipad) και απόκτησε πρόσβαση:

• στον Yellow Λογαριασμό σου, για να γνωρίζεις ανά πάσα στιγμή πόσα yellows έχεις στη διάθεσή σου
• σε όλα τα νέα και τις προσφορές του Προγράμματος
• στους Συνεργάτες του Προγράμματος, για να κερδίζεις ακόμα περισσότερα yellows και να εξαργυρώνεις τα yellows που έχεις στην κατοχή σου
• σε μοναδικές για σένα Yellow προσφορές, που μπορείς να κάνεις δικές σου, εξαργυρώνοντας yellows μέσα από το app

Εφόσον είσαι Μέλος του Προγράμματος Yellow και διαθέτεις κωδικούς Piraeus e-banking, κάνε σήμερα κιόλας την εγγραφή σου στην mobile εφαρμογή του Yellow!

Για την ασφάλειά σου, κατά την εγγραφή σου στην εφαρμογή, θα σου ζητηθεί να εισάγεις τους Piraeus e-banking κωδικούς σου (username και password) και στη συνέχεια να ορίσεις PIN ή/και προαιρετικά σύνδεση με δακτυλικό αποτύπωμα ή αναγνώριση προσώπου, εφόσον το υποστηρίζει η συσκευή σου.
Έτσι, θα συνδέεσαι εύκολα και γρήγορα και θα πραγματοποιείς τις συναλλαγές σου με τη μέγιστη δυνατή ασφάλεια.


Με το Yellow app, έχεις όλο το Yellow στο κινητό σου:


• Γνωρίζεις πόσα yellows διαθέτεις, καθώς και αν έχεις yellows που λήγουν σύντομα, μέσα από την ενότητα προφίλ της εφαρμογής
• Αποκτάς προσφορές, εκπτωτικούς κωδικούς και Δωροεπιταγές μέσω του app με τα yellows που έχεις στην κατοχή σου
• Μαθαίνεις πρώτος τα νέα του Προγράμματος και τις τρέχουσες προσφορές των Συνεργατών. Μάλιστα, έχεις τη δυνατότητα να ενεργοποιήσεις τις ειδοποιήσεις για να ενημερώνεσαι άμεσα για ό,τι νέο υπάρχει
• Βλέπεις τις προσφορές που σου ταιριάζουν μέσα από την ενότητα «Για σένα»
• Βρίσκεις πληροφορίες για τους Συνεργάτες του Προγράμματος, για να ξέρεις τι κερδίζεις με κάθε σου συναλλαγή
• Έχεις πρόσβαση σε όλες τις πληροφορίες του Προγράμματος, για να δεις πώς μπορείς να κερδίσεις ακόμα περισσότερα yellows και πού μπορείς να τα εξαργυρώσεις.
• Στέλνεις στην Εξυπηρέτηση Πελατών ερωτήματα / αιτήματα, σχετικά με την εφαρμογή, μέσα από την ενότητα «Επικοινωνία»
• Εξαργυρώνεις τους εκπτωτικούς κωδικούς και τις Δωροεπιταγές σου, μέσα από την εφαρμογή, για ακόμα μεγαλύτερη ευκολία

Δεν είσαι Μέλος του Προγράμματος Επιβράβευσης Yellow ή/και δεν έχεις κωδικούς Piraeus e-banking; Μπορείς να κάνεις την εγγραφή σου στο Piraeus e-banking και στο Πρόγραμμα Yellow online, μέσω του Piraeus e-banking ή του Piraeus app.

Κάνε ό,τι έκανες πάντα και κέρδισε όπως δεν κέρδισες ποτέ
...και με την mobile εφαρμογή του Yellow!

*Η εγκατάσταση της εφαρμογής Yellow είναι δωρεάν, αλλά πιθανόν να ισχύουν χρεώσεις για χρήση δεδομένων σύμφωνα με τον τηλεπικοινωνιακό πάροχο.

Το myDATAapp είναι η επίσημη mobile εφαρμογή της Ανεξάρτητης Αρχής Δημοσίων Εσόδων, για την ψηφιακή έκδοση και διαβίβαση παραστατικών στην πλατφόρμα myDATA. Σχεδιασμένη για να διευκολύνει επαγγελματίες και επιχειρήσεις στην καθημερινή τους λειτουργία, η εφαρμογή προσφέρει μια ασφαλή και αποδοτική πλατφόρμα για την εκπλήρωση των φορολογικών σας υποχρεώσεων. Απαραίτητη προϋπόθεση για τη χρήση της εφαρμογής myDATAapp είναι η δημιουργία Φιλικών Κωδικών μέσω της εφαρμογής myDATAusers, στην ψηφιακή πύλη myAADE (myaade.gov.gr), στη διαδρομή Εφαρμογές > Δημοφιλείς Εφαρμογές > myDATA > Φιλικοί κωδικοί και εξουσιοδοτήσεις myDATAusers.

developer: NN Hellenic Life Insurance Co. S.A
description:
Μέσα από τη νέα mobile εφαρμογή myNN έχετε:
- Πλήρη εικόνα για ασφαλιστήριά σας χάρη στην προσωποποιημένη κεντρική σελίδα που συγκεντρώνει τις σημαντικότερες για εσάς πληροφορίες.
- Πρόσβαση στα ηλεκτρονικά σας έγγραφα όπου και αν βρίσκεστε.
- Καλύτερη παρακολούθηση των πληρωμών σας και δυνατότητα online εξόφλησης του ασφαλίστρου σας.
- Άμεση πληροφόρηση μέσα από τη νέα σελίδα μηνυμάτων.



Κατεβάστε τώρα στο κινητό σας τη mobile εφαρμογή myNN και αποκτήστε πρόσβαση σε όλες τις πληροφορίες που έχουν σημασία για εσάς εύκολα, γρήγορα και με ασφάλεια.


Επικοινωνήστε με την NN Hellas
info@nnhellas.gr

The new app for stress-free banking, by NBG. Next was designed to make the management of your finances easy and bring you amazing gifts and rewards.

Are you under 30? Then you can open the Next Flexible Account with an exclusive 2.50% interest rate up to €10,000, daily interest updates, and the freedom to deposit or withdraw funds anytime you like!

With Next you can also:

 
Track everything at a glance
You can easily have the full overview of your accounts & cards, track your income and expenses, and monitor your transactions & savings goals.
 
Set savings goals
Got your eye on shoes or a trip? Whatever goal you set, it's easy to save money to achieve it. 
 
Benefit more and more 
The more you use Next, the faster you upgrade to the next level and enjoy more benefits.
 
Access exclusive offers and unique draws
New offers keep coming! Don't miss the chance to benefit in your everyday life and enjoy unique experiences.  
 
Receive notifications 
Keep track of your transactions, savings goals, offers, draws, and more with instant notifications.

Next. Money management made chill.

Experience the €pistrofi Rewards Program by Eurobank – easily and quickly, through the all-new €pistrofi app!
Track your collected euros, discover partner businesses near you and enjoy exclusive offers – no matter where you are.

With €pistrofi app, you can:
• Instantly view your available €pistrofi euros and your full transaction history
• Easily monitor euros that are about to expire, so you can redeem them in time
• Receive notifications for exclusive, personalized offers
• Quickly find over 8,500 partner businesses by area or business name
• Locate nearby businesses and navigate to them via the integrated map
• Contact Customer Support directly through the in-app contact form

Important Note:
The app supports only Eurobank credit and debit cards that participate in €pistrofi Rewards Program.

Not supported:
Prepaid Visa, Yes Visa, Reward Visa & World MasterCard, Masoutis Visa, Bestline Visa Classic, Makro, Post Credit

Requirements:
iOS 11 and above | Optimized for smartphones and tablets

Discover the new €pistrofi app today!

Perfect for beginners, or more seasoned traders, Revolut X has the tools to trade and manage your crypto. All available at your fingertips.

Trade in real-time on the crypto exchange, with market orders, or control the price you buy with limit orders. Explore 400+ available pairs to get the most from your trades, in USD, EUR, or GBP.

Move from crypto to cash and back again without blocks from your bank. There are no limits or barriers when you use Revolut X with your Revolut account. 

With security you can bank on, you can relax knowing the majority of our funds are held in cold storage. We’re trusted by 45+ million to protect £20.9 billion of their money — we’ve got experience at this. Your assets are held 1:1 and never lent out. Our purpose-built defences are constantly monitoring risks, to prevent account takeovers.

Access customer support 24/7, available in 100+ languages — and all our chats are encrypted, so your personal details stay safe.

Not regulated or protected. Value can go down. Tax may be payable on gains

Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

developer: VIVA WALLET HOLDINGS - SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT SA
description:
The viva.com is the money management app for using your viva.com cards and more.

Get started
• Open your merchant account easily from your phone with no waiting time or delays.

Sales history and reports
• Monitor your business performance at a glance
• Issue refunds to your customers
• View real-time Sales history
• View details for Sales transactions

Manage your expenses and money
• Send and receive money
• Create and manage Digital and Physical cards for you or your employees

• Match receipts with transactions to make expense reporting effortless

Other features
• Instant push notifications for account activity and transactions

Viva.com Saver Account*:
 A fully online business savings account that helps you earn interest—while keeping you in control with easy access to your funds anytime you need them.
*Available in Eurozone countries.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.
